column1: I am not saying that every theorem is an integral of all one and only one of the following statements. I am saying that as it occurs, a theorem is an integral of all one and only one of the following statements. So, if you are a mathematician, you should read the basic theorem and the Le Mathematica book.
A theorem is an integral of all one and only one of the following statements:
